Hi! Here's a little about me.

My name is Adham Elarabawy, and I'm a rising freshman at UC Berkeley for Electrical Engineering & Computer Science. Academically, I'm interested in machine learning, computer vision, and their applications to robotics. Check my resume out.

In my free time, I love to spikeball with friends, play tennis, surf, go to the beach, cook, and work on my own 3D-printed quadruped robot.

You can reach me at adhamelarabawy@gmail.com for personal inquiries & aelarabawy@berkeley.edu for academic inquiries.
